content:
SerializationFormat Enum

Definition

Represents the formatting type to use when the chart is serialized.

In this Article

public enum SerializationFormat
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SerializationFormat

Remarks

The SerializationFormat enumeration is used in conjunction with the Format property.

Fields

Binary

Chart data will be serialized in a binary format.
Xml

Chart data will be serialized using well-formed XML.
